related_questions.question: What are the advantages of passive solar heating?
related_questions.snippet: A huge benefit of passive solar design is that it saves money that would otherwise be spent on utilities toward and heating and cooling bills. It is a clean and efficient use of energy because it is based off of a type of energy that is readily available and occurs naturally.

related_questions.question: Why solar panels are bad?
related_questions.snippet: While solar panels are considered a form of clean, renewable energy, the manufacturing process does produce greenhouse gas emissions. Additionally, to produce solar panels, manufacturers need to handle toxic chemicals. However, solar panels are not emitting toxins into the atmosphere as they're generating electricity.Feb 1, 2018

organic_results.title: The Disadvantages of Passive Solar Heating - Our Everyday Life
organic_results.snippet: One of the major drawbacks of passive solar is that heating your home depends entirely on the weather. While many passive solar designs include features to maximize heating from the smallest exposure to the sun's warmth, bad weather can leave your home feeling cold and dreary.
